headline: Fortive Announces Board Chair Transition
summary: EVERETT, Wash., January 29, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Sharmistha "Shar" Dubey as the Chair of the Board. Ms. Dubey succeeds Alan G. Spoon who has notified the Board that he will retire from the Board and not stand for reelection at the upcoming Annual General Meeting in June 2025.

headline: Professional Tools and Equipment Stocks Q3 Highlights: Fortive (NYSE:FTV)
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how professional tools and equipment stocks fared in Q3, starting with Fortive (NYSE:FTV).
